updatePaymentIntent

fun updatePaymentIntent(value: Boolean): CollectConfiguration.Builder

Whether to immediately update the PaymentIntent upon collect.

NOTE: This API is Experimental, may not be available for all accounts, and may change in future versions.

This will give access to the PaymentMethod card data, but requires additional network traffic that may slow down the total transaction time.

var updatePaymentIntent: Boolean
